text: @RepAndyBiggsAZ ICU beds in use: 89% (record high)- 2,876 COVID-19 inpatients (a record high). Hospitals at surge capacity operating w/ crisis standards which = more discharges. Also, more admittance means more discharges. It's simple math. If more come in & there isn't room, some must go.
